item.title: Agg
item.description: Type: Record (aggregation) The type agg is defined as a record various named fields within the region Everything.Full. The record defines the following named fields: Named Fields key (type: Number) id (type: Id) time (type: stamp)

item.title: Something
item.description: Entity Description Entities are the main objects that contexts define. They can be persistent (long-lived) or aggregate (they consume commands and queries). Options The following flags/options were specified for this entity: aggregate - description of what aggregate means persistent - description of what persistent means Types The following types are defined within this entity: somethingDate (alias) States The following states were defined within this entity: someState Fields: field (type: SomeType) Invariants: (none) Functions The following functions are defined for this entity:

item.title: SomeType
item.description: Type: Alias Description No description provided Information The type SomeType is defined as an alias to the primitive type String within the region Everything. This alias was defined in the RIDDL source file ‘everything.riddl’ like so: type SomeType is String

item.title: Stamp
item.description: Type: Alias Description No description provided Information The type stamp is defined as an alias to the primitive type TimeStamp within the region Everything.Full. This alias was defined in the RIDDL source file ‘everything.riddl’ like so: type stamp is TimeStamp

item.title: Url
item.description: Type: Alias Description No description provided Information The type url is defined as an alias to the primitive type URL within the region Everything.Full. This alias was defined in the RIDDL source file ‘everything.riddl’ like so: type url is URL
